product_overview: AJ Abhi Jewels is a premium online jewelry e-commerce platform built on modern web technologies including Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, designed to offer a luxurious and seamless shopping experience for customers while providing comprehensive admin tools for store management.
core_goals: Deliver a seamless, high-performance online jewelry shopping experience
Showcase premium, categorized jewelry collections with detailed product information
Ensure secure and smooth checkout with multiple payment options
Enable efficient wishlist and cart management with real-time updates
Provide a robust admin console for product, order, customer, and analytics management
Incorporate strong security measures including JWT authentication and rate limiting
Implement SEO best practices for high search engine visibility
Leverage modern UX enhancements for superior user engagement and performance
key_features: Intuitive Product Browsing with categories, filtering, and smart search
Dynamic Product Detail Pages showcasing multiple images, specs, and related products
Shopping Cart with instant updates and sidebar quick view
Wishlist functionality with easy item management and persistence
Secure Checkout supporting contact info, shipping, and multiple payment methods
Comprehensive Admin Console with dashboard, analytics, and CRUD operations
Authentication system with JWT tokens, SHA-256 password hashing, and session management
Modern UX enhancements: lazy loading images, smooth scroll, live chat, newsletter popup
SEO utilities including sitemap, robots.txt, and metadata management
Responsive design with luxury color palette and typography optimized for jewelry brand
user_flow_summary: User visits landing page to explore featured collections and products
User browses product categories, filters and searches for desired jewelry items
User views detailed product pages with specifications, certifications, and related products
User adds products to cart or wishlist for later purchase
User proceeds to checkout entering contact, shipping, and payment details
User completes order and receives confirmation
Admin logs in via secure authentication and accesses dashboard
Admin manages products, orders, customers, and views analytics
Admin updates store settings and monitors system health
validation_criteria: All pages conform to performance targets including Fast Contentful Paint and low input delay
Cart and wishlist states persist correctly using local storage and Zustand store
User forms (checkout, login) validate input data with clear error messages using zod and react-hook-form
Admin authentication enforces rate limiting, JWT session expiry, and password security
Product CRUD operations succeed with proper data validation and image uploads
SEO features generate correct meta tags, sitemap, and robots.txt files
Responsive design verified across mobile, tablet, desktop, and large screens
Error boundaries effectively capture and display component errors
Critical paths covered by unit, integration, and E2E tests with specified coverage thresholds
